00021    TetherMaster::TetherMaster()
00022     : tetherCapacity_(0),
00023       atomCapacity_(0)
00024    {}

00029    void TetherMaster::readParam(std::istream& in)
00030    {
00031       readBegin(in, "TetherMaster");
00032       read<int>(in, "tetherCapacity", tetherCapacity_); 
00033       read<int>(in, "atomCapacity", atomCapacity_); 
00034       readEnd(in);
00035 
00036       allocate();
00037    }
00038 
00042    void TetherMaster::addTether(Atom& atom, const Vector& anchor)
00043    {
00044       Tether* tetherPtr;
00045       int     atomId = atom.id();
00046 
00047       // Check preconditions
00048       if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= atomCapacity_) {
00049          Log::file() << "AtomId       = " << atomId << std::endl;
00050          Log::file() << "atomCapacity = " << atomCapacity_ << std::endl;
00051          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00052       }
00053       if (tetherPtrs_[atomId]) {
00054          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to addTether to tethered Atom");
00055       }
00056 
00057       // Pop an unused Tether off the reservoir
00058       tetherPtr = &reservoir_.pop();
00059       tetherSet_.append(*tetherPtr);
00060 
00061       // Initialize the Tether, and add its address to tetherPtrs_[atomId]
00062       tetherPtr->setAnchor(anchor);
00063       tetherPtr->setAtom(atom);
00064       tetherPtrs_[atomId] = tetherPtr;
00065 
00066    }
00067 
00071    void TetherMaster::transferTether(Atom& oldAtom, Atom& newAtom)
00072    {
00073       Tether* tetherPtr;
00074       int     oldId, newId;
00075 
00076       // Check preconditions
00077       oldId = oldAtom.id(); 
00078       newId = newAtom.id(); 
00079       if (oldId < 0 || oldId >= atomCapacity_) {
00080          UTIL_THROW("Invalid old atom id");
00081       }
00082       if (newId < 0 || newId >= atomCapacity_) {
00083          UTIL_THROW("Invalid new atom id");
00084       }
00085 
00086       tetherPtr = tetherPtrs_[oldId];
00087       if (tetherPtr == 0) {
00088          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to transfer from untethered Atom");
00089       }
00090       if (tetherPtrs_[newId]) {
00091          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to transfer to a tethered Atom");
00092       }
00093 
00094       // Make switch
00095       tetherPtr->setAtom(newAtom);
00096       tetherPtrs_[oldId] = 0;
00097       tetherPtrs_[newId] = tetherPtr;
00098 
00099    }
00100 
00101    /*
00102    * Transfer a tether from one Atom to another.
00103    */ 
00104    void TetherMaster::transferTether(Tether& tether, Atom& newAtom)
00105    {
00106       int     oldId, newId;
00107 
00108       // Check preconditions
00109       if (!tether.hasAtom()) {
00110          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to transfer inactive tether");
00111       }
00112       oldId = tether.atom().id(); 
00113       if (oldId < 0 || oldId >= atomCapacity_) {
00114          UTIL_THROW("Invalid old atom id");
00115       }
00116 
00117       newId = newAtom.id(); 
00118       if (newId < 0 || newId >= atomCapacity_) {
00119          UTIL_THROW("Invalid new atom id");
00120       }
00121       if (tetherPtrs_[newId]) {
00122          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to transfer to a tethered Atom");
00123       }
00124 
00125       // Make switch
00126       tether.setAtom(newAtom);
00127       tetherPtrs_[oldId] = 0;
00128       tetherPtrs_[newId] = &tether;
00129 
00130    }

00132    /*
00133    * Associate two Tethered atoms as partners.
00134    */ 
00135    void TetherMaster::pairTethers(const Atom& atom1, const Atom& atom2)
00136    {
00137 
00138       // Retrieve and validate atom Ids
00139       int id1 = atom1.id(); 
00140       int id2 = atom2.id(); 
00141       if (id1 < 0 || id1 >= atomCapacity_) {
00142          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id for atom1");
00143       }
00144       if (id1 < 0 || id2 >= atomCapacity_) {
00145          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id for atom2");
00146       }
00147 
00148       // Retrieve and validate pointers to Tethers
00149       Tether* tetherPtr1 = tetherPtrs_[id1];
00150       Tether* tetherPtr2 = tetherPtrs_[id2];
00151       if (tetherPtr1 == 0) {
00152          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair untethered Atom atom1");
00153       }
00154       if (tetherPtr2 == 0) {
00155          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair untethered Atom atom2");
00156       }
00157 
00158       // Create association
00159       tetherPtr1->setPartner(*tetherPtr2);
00160       tetherPtr2->setPartner(*tetherPtr1);
00161 
00162    }
00163 
00164    /*
00165    * Associate two Tethers as partners.
00166    */ 
00167    void TetherMaster::pairTethers(Tether& tether1, Tether& tether2)
00168    {
00169 
00170       // Check preconditions
00171       if (!tether1.hasAtom()) {
00172          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair inactive tether");
00173       }
00174       if (!tether2.hasAtom()) {
00175          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair inactive tether");
00176       }
00177       if (tether1.hasPartner()) {
00178          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair Tether that has a partner");
00179       }
00180       if (tether2.hasPartner()) {
00181          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to pair Tether that has a partner");
00182       }
00183 
00184       // Create association
00185       tether1.setPartner(tether2);
00186       tether2.setPartner(tether1);
00187 
00188    }

00194    void TetherMaster::removeTether(const Atom& atom)
00195    {
00196 
00197       Tether* tetherPtr;
00198       int     id;
00199 
00200       // Check preconditions
00201       id = atom.id();
00202       if (id < 0 || id >= atomCapacity_) {
00203          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00204       }
00205       tetherPtr = tetherPtrs_[id];
00206       if (tetherPtr == 0) {
00207          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to destroy tether to untethered Atom");
00208       }
00209 
00210       // Call private remove method
00211       removeTether(tetherPtr, id);
00212 
00213    }
00214 
00218    void TetherMaster::removeTether(Tether& tether)
00219    {
00220 
00221       // Check preconditions
00222       if (!tether.hasAtom()) {
00223          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to destroy inactive tether");
00224       }
00225       int id = tether.atom().id();
00226       if (id < 0 || id >= atomCapacity_) {
00227          UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00228       }
00229 
00230       // Call private remove method
00231       removeTether(&tether, id);
00232 
00233    }
00234 
00238    void TetherMaster::removeTether(Tether* tetherPtr, int id)
00239    {
00240 
00241       // Deactivate this tether
00242       tetherPtrs_[id] = 0;
00243       tetherPtr->unsetAtom();
00244 
00245       // Deactivate partner, if any.
00246       if (tetherPtr->hasPartner()) {
00247 
00248          Tether* partnerPtr = &tetherPtr->partner();
00249 
00250     // Break association
00251     tetherPtr->unsetPartner();
00252          partnerPtr->unsetPartner();
00253 
00254     // Deactivate partner
00255          id = partnerPtr->atom().id(); 
00256          if (id < 0 || id >= atomCapacity_) {
00257             UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id");
00258          }
00259          partnerPtr->unsetAtom();
00260          tetherPtrs_[id] = 0;
00261      
00262     // Return partner to reservoir 
00263     tetherSet_.remove(*partnerPtr);
00264     reservoir_.push(*partnerPtr);
00265 
00266       }
00267 
00268       // Return tether to reservoir 
00269       tetherSet_.remove(*tetherPtr);
00270       reservoir_.push(*tetherPtr);
00271    }
00272 
00273    /*
00274    * Allocate and initialize all required memory.
00275    */
00276    void TetherMaster::allocate() 
00277    {
00278 
00279       tethers_.allocate(tetherCapacity_);
00280       reservoir_.allocate(tetherCapacity_);
00281       tetherSet_.allocate(tethers_);
00282 
00283       // Push all tethers onto reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00284       // The first element tethers_[0] wll be at the top of stack.
00285       int i;
00286       for (i = tetherCapacity_ - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00287          reservoir_.push(tethers_[i]);
00288       }
00289 
00290       // Allocate and nullify array of pointers to tethers.
00291       tetherPtrs_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00292       for (i = 0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00293          tetherPtrs_[i] = 0;
00294       }
00295 
00296    }
00297 
00298    /*
00299    * Return true if this TetherMaster is valid, or throw an Exception.
00300    */
00301    bool TetherMaster::isValid() const
00302    {
00303 
00304       const Tether* tetherPtr;
00305       const Tether* partnerPtr;
00306       const Atom*   atomPtr;
00307 
00308       if (tethers_.isAllocated()) {
00309 
00310          if (tethers_.capacity() != reservoir_.capacity()) {
00311             UTIL_THROW("Unequal capacities for tethers_ and reservoir_");
00312          }
00313          if (tethers_.capacity() != reservoir_.size() + tetherSet_.size()) {
00314             UTIL_THROW("tethers_ capacity != reservoir_ + tetherSet_ sizes");
00315          }
00316 
00317          // Check consistency of all tethers in tetherSet
00318          int i, atomId;
00319          for (i = 0; i < tetherSet_.size(); ++i) {
00320             tetherPtr = &(tetherSet_[i]); 
00321 
00322             // Check pointer to an Atom
00323             if (!tetherPtr->hasAtom()) {
00324                UTIL_THROW("Tether in tetherSet has no Atom");
00325             }
00326             atomPtr = &tetherPtr->atom();
00327             atomId  = atomPtr->id();
00328             if (tetherPtrs_[atomId] != tetherPtr) {
00329                UTIL_THROW("Inconsistency a Tether and tetherPtrs_ array");
00330             }
00331 
00332             // Check partner, if any
00333             if (tetherPtr->hasPartner()) {
00334                partnerPtr = &tetherPtr->partner();
00335                if (!partnerPtr->hasPartner()) {
00336                   UTIL_THROW("Partner of Tether has no Partner");
00337                }
00338                if (tetherPtr != &partnerPtr->partner()) {
00339                   UTIL_THROW("Inconsistency partner addresses");
00340                }
00341             }
00342 
00343          }
00344 
00345          // Count all active tethers in tethers_ array
00346          int nCount = 0;
00347          for (i = 0; i < tetherCapacity_; ++i) {
00348             tetherPtr = &tethers_[i]; 
00349             if (tetherPtr->hasAtom()) {
00350                ++nCount;
00351             } else {
00352                //if (tetherPtr->hasPartner()) {
00353                //   UTIL_THROW("Tether has no Atom but has Partner");
00354                //}
00355             }
00356          }
00357          if (nCount != tetherSet_.size()) {
00358             UTIL_THROW("Number of Tethers with atoms != tetherSet.size()");
00359          }
00360 
00361          // Count all non-null pointers in tetherPtrs_ array
00362          nCount = 0;
00363          for (i = 0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00364             if (tetherPtrs_[i]) {
00365                ++nCount;
00366             }
00367          }
00368          if (nCount != tetherSet_.size()) {
00369             UTIL_THROW("Count non-null Tether* pointers != tetherSet.size()");
00370          }
00371 
00372       }
00373       return true;
00374 
00375    }
